notes: From the 17th October to 17 November 2017 the Internews team in Bangladesh composed of the Asia Humanitarian Advisor and the Internews Bangladesh Country Representative conducted an Information Needs Assessment in Cox’s Bazar, surveying approximately 570 people in both Rohingya refugee and host communities. WFP also contributed to this report with the support of the ETS’s Services for Communities Adviser, which additionally looked into various previous and ongoing assessments to collate data from various sources to provide information about the telecommunications landscape.
